item.title: analogsea - an R client for the Digital Ocean API
item.description: analogsea is now on CRAN. We started developing the pkg back in May 2014, but just now getting the first version on CRAN. It’s a collaboration with Hadley and Winston Chang. item.title: analogsea - an R client for the Digital Ocean API
item.description: I think this package name is my best yet. Maybe it doesn’t make sense though? At least it did at the time… Anyway, the main motivation for this package was to be able to automate spinning up Linux boxes to do cloud R/RStudio work. Of course if you are a command line native this is all easy for you, but if you are afraid of the command line and/or just don’t want to deal with it, this tool will hopefully help.
